titles.title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 335 Merchant Street, Honolulu, Hawaii, as the "Frank F. Fasi Post Office Building".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 7/13/2010--Introduced. Designates the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 335 Merchant Street, Honolulu, Hawaii, as the "Frank F. Fasi Post Office Building."
